definition: Monument to the People's Heroes, at Tiananmen Square
pinyin: Ren2 min2 Ying1 xiong2 Ji4 nian4 bei1

definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]

sentences.english: I will devote a basket of flowers to the Monument to the People's Heroes.
sentences.chinese: 我将向人民英雄纪念碑献上一篮鲜花。

definition: Tiananmen Gate, entrance of the Imperial City in Beijing

definition: Lugou Bridge or Marco Polo Bridge in southwest of Beijing, the scene of a conflict that marked the beginning of the Second Sino-Japanese War 抗日戰爭|抗日战争[Kang4 Ri4 Zhan4 zheng1]
the Great Hall of the People in Beijing
